bibl.title: with an Appendix by John BAINES, Glimpsing Alexandria from Archaeological Evidence.
bibl.note: Harbours. - Street grid. - Blocks of architecture and sculpture found under water. - Some in situ Ptolemaic buildings in the palace area. - The Temple of Serapis. - Lageion. - Buildings in the late-antique city centre. - Pp. 61-63: John BAINES, Appendix: Possible implications of the Egyptian word for Alexandria.
McKENZIE Judith, with an Appendix by John BAINES, Glimpsing Alexandria from Archaeological Evidence.
JRA 16 (2003) No. 1, pp. 35-63, 19 figg. et plans.
